data.title: Very nice stop!
data.text: We stopped in for coffee while waiting for showtime at the Owen Theatre. My wife said it was one of the best Mochas she has ever had. The service was great, staff is very personable and attentive. We only had coffee how ever there were some wonderful looking pastries. Great Place!!!

data.title: Conroe Coffee
data.text: It is an ok place really for the younger crowd.  Little loud for my taste. Although it is a nice place.

data.title: Surprising Find in Dowtown Conroe
data.text: We go here all the time. The staff is friendly and the owner is always present. They have great authentic teas and coffees and really unique ice cream flavors. Visit during the Conroe Farmers Market to get yummy benigts! Nursing Friendly

data.title: Great atmosphere, coffee & treats!
data.text: Great atmosphere, coffee & treats. And an amazing way to end the evening with my wife out on the town when it's date night.

data.title: Casual, neighborhood coffee shop
data.text: My wife and I came in for lunch.  The shop has a very local clientele, but we were made to feel right at home.  We had excellent sandwiches for our lunch, but the friendly staff was what impressed us.

data.title: Great Coffee and Smoothies
data.text: My husband and I love this coffee shop. In addition to serving great beverages, snacks, and sandwiches, there is an attached gift shop. It's a fun place to meet with your friends, do homework, or just relax with a book. Support local business and try this place out!

data.title: Great Mango Smoothies and More
data.text:
I am a late comer to mango.  Now I love it.  Especially mango smoothies.  This is a the place to get a nice cold smoothie.

When they have their Michigan pothole chocolate ice cream - GET IT.  It is worth it when you need your chocolate fix.

data.title: Best coffee ever!
data.text: Stop by for the best gourmet coffee ever - roasted in house with so many choices you will have to make return visits! Great customer service and peaceful atmosphere! Love this place!

data.title: It May Be the Best Coffee House in the County, But Lacks Business Processes
data.text: This is a locally owned "mom and pop" kind of place, smack in the middle of actual downtown Conroe, with excellent coffee, a very eclectic, almost country-bohemian environment. The store decor is shabby-not so chic with a micro store connected with things like glitterized crosses, skinny pants, and soaps...a bunch of odd disconnected things. The coffee house serves Lavazza coffee (!!!) which is at least in the top 10 of mass produced brands worldwide. The poor little young lady was not enough staff to handle customer after customer. Little processes slipped. The pastry, I was told, was made onsite. I doubt that. It was awesome, authentic, Danish, flaky, etc., but the many pastries looked like they were Saran-wrapped from a Costco bulk box, while other candies and home made style desserts such as lemon bars looked authentically small batched scratch made. I would go here again for sure, but they need more staff or better labor usage. There is seating outside on the sidewalk. I could not get the free wi-fi to work. They serve a small amount of breakfast items. Had I ordered that, the single employee could not have handled the traffic.

data.title: Perfect Stop
data.text: This coffee shop was a wonderful stop. The sandwiches were good, the service was pleasant and the atmosphere was unique, quite and enjoyable. The decor was eclectic....it reminded me of the Houston area heights. The coffee was a delight, the tea selection great and the pastries a delight. We just loved this delightful spot in the heart of downtown conroe.

data.title: Yummy coffee :)
data.text: I had a great toffee latte here. Also, they sell the good macarons! Can't miss stopping in. And awesome location  in the square Downtown.

data.title: Best Coffee House in Montgomery County!
data.text: What an awesome gem! This small business run by Leo Harris is marvelous!!! Leo brings her eclectic charm to every corner of the coffee house. Leo is from England so there is a unique fusion of British and Texas influence. And that's just the ambiance! The coffee is the BEST! I am so happy to have somewhere to go that isn't starbucks. All of the baristas are sweet and efficient. You are always greeted with a smile:-) conroe coffee is a must for any true coffee fan.

data.title: Great little coffee shop in the heart of Conroe
data.text: It's not the box-coffee-shop you see on every corner, which is what makes this place great. Retro-chic decor with a British twist... Owner is always so pleasant and funny, and she remembers her patrons, even when it's been a little while between visits.  I don't stop by every day as I'm normally looking to "treat myself" whenever I visit, so I normally go for one of their flavored latte options.  Last fall, I became addicted to their Pumpkin Spice Latte, which was better than any I'd had before!  It's just a neat little shop with great coffee and delicious-looking desserts (I haven't indulged in those yet!)  But they are nice to look at!

data.title: Great place to have coffe and do some shopping
data.text: Excellent place to sit and have coffee (Lavazza Italian coffee)  prepared by the owner who is a delightful lady.  The decor is retro which I totally love.

data.title: Wonderful Downtown Coffee House
data.text: Conroe Cafe is delightfully charming with fun decor. They have almond milk as an option, which is fabulous, as well as desserts, simple sandwiches and other nibbles that are particularly nice while visiting with friends before taking in a show at Crighton Theatre. They feature young local musicians who sing, play guitar, keyboards, and even violin. The place has a young, quirky vibe in general, but welcomes all ages.  Stroll by, stop in, or sit for a spell. It's a happy place in a way that makes the world authentically better. 😃

data.title: Quaint little space
data.text: Interesting eclectic decor. The metal chairs were not comfortable for me and the espresso was not very good. Leo is a charming hostess and has a lot of good ideas for the place. Live music has the place jumping in the evenings.

data.title: THE Best Coffee Shop in Conroe
data.text: Conroe Coffee is a wonderful coffee shop in Conroe with a British flair.  I am always greeted with a friendly smile and chat with the owner.  Breakfast items and sandwiches are available.  Bring your laptop and enjoy the wifi.
